template.p: This setup is for surveyors that sell services like land measurement & mapping, planning permission, mediation counsel, etc to private customers as well as companies (architect, notary, real estate, ‚Ä¶).
They need a website to collect new leads and give access to produced documents.
They also need subscriptions for long term relationships with larger companies that require several services per year.

ul.li: Project App: Manage complex surveying sites as distinct projects, tracking tasks like initial measurements, data processing, and report generation.
Planning App: Optimize your field operations by visually scheduling surveyors and equipment to specific locations and times.
Documents App: Securely store, organize, and share heavy files such as topographic maps, CAD drawings, and compliance reports.
Knowledge App: Create a central repository for internal procedures, safety guidelines, and technical standards accessible to all staff.
CRM App: Track potential projects and manage relationships with developers, construction firms, and private property owners.
Sales App: Generate detailed proposals and contracts for surveying services, ensuring clear scope and pricing agreements.
Invoicing App: Bill clients accurately based on project milestones or time spent on site, maintaining healthy cash flow.

template.p: Visit the Contact us page: This form will create an opportunity in the CRM, with the right information.
From the CRM, schedule a call or a meeting. Based on the client‚Äôs need, you can create a quotation using the quotation templates.
Quicker flow where the surveyor can directly create and send a quote to the lead.
When the quote is signed by the customer, a dedicated project is created with all the services listed in the quotation as a task.
In Planning, the surveyor can allocate the task to each employee (himself, topographer or drawer).

In all cases, a surveyor will deliver documents. Therefore an integration with Documents is enabled to easily share the created documents and gather them if needed. To this intent a share link (share & upload) can be generated for each project sub-workspace so that the customer has direct access to it.
Once the final documents are delivered to the customer, the surveyor can send the final invoice potentially adapting the hours spent on each service.
